rooms.description: This is room one. It's the first best room. You see doors to your east and south.
This is room two. This is the second best room. You see doors to your northeast, south and west.
This is room three. You see doors to your north, east, southeast, and south.
This is room four. You see doors to your north, south, southwest, and west.
This is room five. There is a seemingly endless ladder into the resplendent space above. You also see a door to your southwest.
This is room six. You see doors to your north, northeast, and east.
This is room seven. You see doors to your north, west, and northwest.
This is room eight. There is a seemingly endless ladder into the tenebrous abyss below. You also see doors to the northeast, southeast, southwest and northwest.
This is room nine. An abyssal throbbing fills the air. There is a dark gate to the south, as well as the ladder from whence you came.
This is room ten. A divine glow fills the room. There is a gate made of light to the north. There is also the ladder from whence you came.
This is room eleven. You have entered the dark gate...
rooms.eventDescription:
You have entered the very depths of this darkest hole. Inside, you see a horrific sight, so maddening that you can neither look nor look away. 
 The Heart of Darkness slumbers here! By entering this area, you have broken the seal and awoken it! 
 In so doing, it shatters the world with it's colossal size... 
 ENDING 1: Hastened the End

rooms.description: This is room twelve. You have entered the light gate...
rooms.eventDescription:
You have finally emerged from the pitiless stone catacombs of the dungeon. Clambering to the surface, you pause to catch your breath. 
 You have escaped, and now you seal off the dungeon so that no other poor soul may become entrapped within... 
 ENDING 2: Escape

monsters.name: Gogolithic Mass
monsters.description:
This small, dark animal is an ancient, primordial evil that has risen from the abyss of twenty seven centuries. 
 The bane of cleanliness, this beast is a force to be reckoned with.

monsters.name: The Nameless One
monsters.description:
This omniscient entity will never give you up, never let you down, and never run around and desert you. 
 In addition, it will never make you cry, never say goodbye, and never tell a lie or hurt you.

monsters.name: The Heart of Darkness
monsters.description:
This antediluvian evil will stop at nothing to purge humanity from the earth. 
 It is our father and mother, alpha and omega, creator and destroyer.

monsters.name: Absolute Nothingness
monsters.description:
A cosmic void, incomprehensible to mankind. 
 It approaches you menacingly...

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A sturdy, well balanced sword with light rusting. Average sharpness.

items.name: Steel Sword
items.description: A sturdy, well balanced sword in pristine condition. Considerable sharpness.

items.name: Coins
items.description: A weighty bag of shiny, golden coins. Just looking at it makes you happy.

items.name: Fire Wand
items.description: A strange rod made of copper with a ruby at the tip. It radiates warmth and possesses the power of immolation.

items.name: Ice Wand
items.description: A strange rod made of silver with a sapphire at the tip. It radiates cold and reminds you strongly of home.

items.name: Lightning Wand
items.description: A strange rod made of gold with a topaz at the tip. It makes your hand tingle when you hold it.

items.name: Void Wand
items.description: A strange rod made of stygian iron with an onyx at the tip. It banishes foes to another plane.

items.name: Sun Sword
items.description: A divine weapon used in the kingdom of Astora. Inflicts severe damage when used in combat.
